       SUM(pi.grand_total) AS `Invoice Amount`,

  FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi

           AND ple.against_voucher_no = ple.voucher_no

 WHERE pi.docstatus = 1

   AND pi.company = 'Paicho Pasal Pvt Ltd., Khaireni'

SELECT parent1.name AS "Account",
       FORMAT(COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN parent1.root_type = 'Liability' THEN gl_entry.credit - gl_entry.debit ELSE gl_entry.debit - gl_entry.credit END), 0), 2) AS "Balance",
       parent1.root_type AS "Type"
  FROM `tabAccount` parent1
  LEFT JOIN `tabAccount` parent2
    ON parent2.parent_account = parent1.name
  LEFT JOIN `tabAccount` parent3
    ON parent3.parent_account = parent2.name
  LEFT JOIN `tabAccount` parent4
    ON parent4.parent_account = parent3.name
  LEFT JOIN `tabGL Entry` gl_entry
    ON (gl_entry.account = parent1.name OR gl_entry.account = parent2.name OR gl_entry.account = parent3.name OR gl_entry.account = parent4.name)
   AND gl_entry.company = 'Paicho Pasal Pvt Ltd., Khaireni'
   AND gl_entry.posting_date BETWEEN '2024-07-15' AND '2024-09-01'
 WHERE parent1.company = 'Paicho Pasal Pvt Ltd., Khaireni'
   AND parent1.root_type IN ('Asset', 'Liability', 'Equity')
 GROUP BY parent1.name,
          parent1.root_type
HAVING COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN parent1.root_type = 'Liability' THEN gl_entry.credit - gl_entry.debit ELSE gl_entry.debit - gl_entry.credit END), 0) != 0
 ORDER BY CASE WHEN parent1.name = 'Application of Funds (HPPL)' THEN 1
               WHEN parent1.name = 'Current Assets'              THEN 2
               WHEN parent1.name = 'Account Receivable'          THEN 3
               WHEN parent1.name = 'Debtors'                     THEN 4
               WHEN parent1.root_type = 'Asset'                  THEN 100
               WHEN parent1.root_type = 'Liability'              THEN 200
               WHEN parent1.root_type = 'Equity'                 THEN 300
               ELSE 400
                END,
          parent1.name

WITH Gross_Profit_CTE AS (
        SELECT (COALESCE((SELECT SUM(si.grand_total) FROM `tabSales Invoice` si WHERE si.posting_date = CURDATE() AND si.docstatus = 1), 0) + COALESCE((SELECT SUM(sle.actual_qty * sle.valuation_rate) FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle WHERE sle.posting_date <= CURDATE() AND sle.is_cancelled = 0), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(pi.grand_total) FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi WHERE pi.posting_date = CURDATE() AND pi.docstatus = 1), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(sle.actual_qty * sle.valuation_rate) FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle WHERE sle.posting_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND sle.is_cancelled = 0), 0)) AS Gross_Profit
       ),
       Indirect_Income_CTE AS (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(gl.credit - gl.debit), 0) AS Indirect_Income
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
          JOIN `tabAccount` acc
            ON gl.account = acc.name
         WHERE acc.root_type = 'Income'
           AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Indirect Income%'
       ),
       Indirect_Expense_CTE AS (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(gl.debit - gl.credit), 0) AS Indirect_Expense
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
          JOIN `tabAccount` acc
            ON gl.account = acc.name
         WHERE acc.root_type = 'Expense'
           AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Indirect Expense%'
       ) SELECT 'Net Profit' AS Particular,
       (Gross_Profit + Indirect_Income - Indirect_Expense) AS Amount
  FROM Gross_Profit_CTE,
       Indirect_Income_CTE,
       Indirect_Expense_CTE
UNION ALL SELECT 'Total Fixed Assets' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT SUM(gl.debit) - SUM(gl.credit)
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
          JOIN `tabAccount` acc
            ON gl.account = acc.name
         WHERE (acc.parent_account LIKE 'Fixed Assets%' OR acc.name LIKE 'Fixed Assets%')
           AND gl.posting_date <= CURDATE()
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Opening Cash' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT SUM(gl.debit - gl.credit)
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
         WHERE gl.posting_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
           AND gl.account LIKE 'Cash%'
           AND gl.is_cancelled = 0
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Closing Cash' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT SUM(gl.debit - gl.credit)
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
         WHERE gl.posting_date <= CURDATE()
           AND gl.account LIKE 'Cash%'
           AND gl.is_cancelled = 0
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Opening Stock' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT SUM(sle.actual_qty * sle.valuation_rate)
          FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
         WHERE sle.posting_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
           AND sle.is_cancelled = 0
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Closing Stock' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT SUM(sle.actual_qty * sle.valuation_rate)
          FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
         WHERE sle.posting_date <= CURDATE()
           AND sle.is_cancelled = 0
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(si.grand_total), 0)
          FROM `tabSales Invoice` si
         WHERE si.posting_date = CURDATE()
           AND si.docstatus = 1
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Purchase' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pi.grand_total), 0)
          FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
         WHERE pi.posting_date = CURDATE()
           AND pi.docstatus = 1
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Gross Profit' AS Particular,
       Gross_Profit
  FROM Gross_Profit_CTE
UNION ALL SELECT 'Indirect Expense' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(gl.debit - gl.credit), 0)
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
          JOIN `tabAccount` acc
            ON gl.account = acc.name
         WHERE acc.root_type = 'Expense'
           AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Indirect Expense%'
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Indirect Income' AS Particular,
       (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(gl.credit - gl.debit), 0)
          FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
          JOIN `tabAccount` acc
            ON gl.account = acc.name
         WHERE acc.root_type = 'Income'
           AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Indirect Income%'
       ) AS Amount
UNION ALL SELECT 'Opening Balance (Receivables)' AS Particular,
       SUM(CASE WHEN gl.posting_date < CURDATE() THEN gl.debit - gl.credit ELSE 0 END) AS Amount
  FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
  JOIN `tabAccount` acc
    ON gl.account = acc.name
 WHERE acc.root_type = 'Asset'
   AND acc.account_type = 'Receivable'
   AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Accounts Receivable%'
UNION ALL SELECT 'Closing Balance (Receivables)' AS Particular,
       SUM(gl.debit - gl.credit) AS Amount
  FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
  JOIN `tabAccount` acc
    ON gl.account = acc.name
 WHERE acc.root_type = 'Asset'
   AND acc.account_type = 'Receivable'
   AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Accounts Receivable%'
UNION ALL SELECT 'Change In Balance (Receivables)' AS Particular,
       (SUM(gl.debit - gl.credit) - SUM(CASE WHEN gl.posting_date < CURDATE() THEN gl.debit - gl.credit ELSE 0 END)) AS Amount
  FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
  JOIN `tabAccount` acc
    ON gl.account = acc.name
 WHERE acc.root_type = 'Asset'
   AND acc.account_type = 'Receivable'
   AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Accounts Receivable%'
UNION ALL SELECT 'Opening Balance (Payables)' AS Particular,
       SUM(CASE WHEN gl.posting_date < CURDATE() THEN gl.credit - gl.debit ELSE 0 END) AS Amount
  FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
  JOIN `tabAccount` acc
    ON gl.account = acc.name

   AND acc.account_type = 'Payable'
   AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Accounts Payable%'
UNION ALL SELECT 'Closing Balance (Payables)' AS Particular,
       SUM(gl.credit - gl.debit) AS Amount
  FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
  JOIN `tabAccount` acc
    ON gl.account = acc.name
 WHERE acc.root_type = 'Liability'
   AND acc.account_type = 'Payable'
   AND acc.parent_account LIKE 'Accounts Payable%'
UNION ALL SELECT 'Change In Balance (Payables)' AS Particular,
